sailpoint.policy

Class AbstractPolicyExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • sailpoint.policy.AbstractPolicyExecutor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PolicyExecutor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BasePluginPolicyExecutor

    public class AbstractPolicyExecutor
extends java.lang.Object
implements PolicyExecutor
    An implementation of PolicyExecutor that provides utility methods common to most executors.

      • isSimulating

      • formatViolation

        public PolicyViolation formatViolation(SailPointContext context,
                                       Identity identity,
                                       Policy policy,
                                       BaseConstraint constraint,
                                       PolicyViolation violation)
        After generating a violation, run the formatting rule if one exists. Do not throw, if there is a problem in the rule use the default violation.

        The rule can either modify the passed violation or generate a new one.
